string_table.string: Closed captions. Press the spacebar to toggle captions on and off.
Skip navigation. Press enter to return to the slide.

slidelink.displaytext: The purpose of the mid-year check-in
Prepare for a successful mid-year check-in
Making the most of your check-in conversation
Employee view: assess performance objective progress
Employee view: assess development objective progress
Employee view: view or add supporting documents
Employee view: review and submit the mid-year check-in assessment
Employee view: mid-year check-in assessment submitted
Manager view: add manager comments to performance objectives
Manager view: add manager comments to development objectives
Manager View: review or add supporting documents
Manager view: print out assessment and hold mid-year check-in
Manager view: verify in Workday mid-year check-in meeting is complete
Manager view: mid-year check-in successfully completed
